authorize-display-profile-link-follower-: By connecting your account, you authorise us to display your profile link and follower count to all users. To adjust your Privacy Settings, visit the Preferences tab.
boost-profile-connect-social-media-showc: Boost your profile's impact by connecting your social media accounts and showcase your profiles and total followers on your public profile.
connect-social-media-accounts: Connect up to four (4) social media accounts
kyc-verification-desc: To enhance your experience and service quality, please complete your personal information. This secures your account for recovery, enables us to provide gifts and rewards, and helps us offer detailed records for your charitable tax benefits.
login-again-after-reset-logout-devices: You will need to login in again after you reset your password. You will be automatically logout.
must-be-unique-char_symbol: Must be a unique combination of 8-16 characters and symbols.
need-break-self-exclusion-start-process: Need a break? In the following process you can exclude yourself. To start the automated self exclusion process, please click the button below to receive confirmation instructions via email.
profile-public-appearance-limits: You control your profile’s public appearance. The limits you set here affect how your profile appears on search engines, profile badges, leaderboards, etc.
receive-email-marketing-desc: Stay in the loop with the latest exclusive promos, updates, news, and by opting in. Unsubscribe at any time.
security-policy-no-email-changes: For security reasons, your registered email address cannot be changed.
setup-google-authenticator: Download and install Google Authenticator - Enable Two-factor Authentication to protect your account from unauthorised access - Scan the QR code with your google Authenticator App or enter the secret key manually.
support-process-contact-us: If you need support, feel free to contact our live support team.
verification-email-desc: To enhance your experience and service quality, please verify your email address.
